name: registerFileRepresentation(forTypeIdentifier:fileOptions:visibility:loadHandler:)
desc: Registers a file-backed representation for an item, specifying file options, item visibility, and a load handler.
declaration:
func registerFileRepresentation(forTypeIdentifier typeIdentifier: String, 
                    fileOptions: NSItemProviderFileOptions = [], 
                     visibility: NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility, 
                    loadHandler: @escaping (@escaping (URL?, Bool, Error?) -> Void) -> Progress?)
